No links here, you can relax now.

1) Share a link to ReadIT

 2) Read it in the next 24 hours

 3) ???

 4) Profit!

1) Add üîó links by sharing them to ReadIT

 2) Check the ‚è≥ remaining time live in the notification

 3) ü§ì Read IT!

 It's really as simple as that!

I'm Alberto, an Italian developer who stopped counting unread articles on Pocket way too long ago.
 During Christmas break '17 I decided to make this app, so that I wouldn't miss out on any new link that I wanted to read in 2018.
 I really hope you're gonna find it as useful as I do.
On a more technical note, I made this app in Kotlin (and had a lot of fun while doing it) and the code is open source.

If you want to reach out to me (and I'd be more than happy if you do) or see the code, here are some links for you
